title: windows .dll missing
body_html:
Hi, I installed pytorch by conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80 successfully
But when I imprt torch, errors occur
from torch._C import * ImportError: DLL load failed:

I use dependency walkers to check _C.CP35-WIN_AMD64.PYD,
and found several .dll are not found by system,
I found TH.DLL and others in D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda\Lib\site-packages\torch\lib,
I don't know why they can not be found.
And what's API-MS-WIN-CORE-VINRT*?

thanks a lot.
body_text:
Hi, I installed pytorch by  conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80 successfully
But when I imprt torch, errors occur
from torch._C import * ImportError: DLL load failed:
I use dependency walkers to check _C.CP35-WIN_AMD64.PYD,
and found several .dll are not found by system,
I found TH.DLL and others in D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda\Lib\site-packages\torch\lib,
I don't know why  they can not be found.

thanks a lot.
body:
Hi, I installed pytorch by  `conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80` successfully
But when I imprt torch, errors occur
`from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed:`

I use dependency walkers to check _C.CP35-WIN_AMD64.PYD, 
and found several .dll are not found by system, 
I found TH.DLL and others in D:\ProgramFiles\Anaconda\Lib\site-packages\torch\lib, 
I don't know why  they can not be found.
And what's API-MS-WIN-CORE-VINRT*?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13451757/47827987-dd867700-ddbb-11e8-91dd-fd82ad04cb15.png)

thanks a lot.
